segments.text: Look , the aliens are sending a message to Mulder . This rocks !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whoops . That's my pager . I had to get it for work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have a pager ? ! That's a little high-tech for you , Stu . Are you sure you know how to use it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I know how to turn it off !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you don't ! It's still beeping ! Come on , hand it over and I'll turn it off for you .
segments.speaker: S1
